description: Parameter descriptors for company information tools

parameters.description: List of company identifiers for basic company information including name, status, industry, employees, and headquarters.
common_mistakes: Making separate calls for each company instead of batching
Using this tool for detailed business descriptions (use get_company_description instead)
Using this for financial data (use financial statement tools instead)

parameters.description: List of company identifiers for one-paragraph business summaries including primary business, products, services, and markets.
common_mistakes: Using this for detailed multi-section descriptions (use get_company_description instead)
Using this for basic company facts like headquarters (use get_info_from_identifiers instead)
Expecting detailed segment breakdowns (summary provides overview only)

parameters.description: List of company identifiers for detailed, multi-section descriptions including segments, competition, history, and significant events.
common_mistakes: Using this for simple business overviews (use get_company_summary instead)
Using this for basic company facts (use get_info_from_identifiers instead)
Expecting financial data (use financial statement tools instead)

parameters.description: List of company identifiers for alternate names, historical names, and native language names.
common_mistakes: Using this for business information (use other company tools instead)
Using this for current company name (use get_info_from_identifiers instead)
Expecting detailed company descriptions (this is only for name variations)

parameters.description: Single company identifier for the company whose advisors you want to find in a specific transaction.
common_mistakes: Using array format instead of single identifier
Not providing transaction_id (required parameter)
Using this without first finding the transaction_id from get_mergers_from_identifiers

parameters.description: The specific transaction ID for the M&A deal. Must be obtained from get_mergers_from_identifiers first.
common_mistakes: Not providing transaction_id (this parameter is required)
Using company name instead of transaction_id
Guessing transaction_id instead of looking it up first

parameters.description: The specific transaction ID for comprehensive M&A transaction information including timeline, participants, and financial details.
common_mistakes: Using company identifier instead of transaction_id
Not finding transaction_id first using get_mergers_from_identifiers
Expecting this to work without a valid transaction_id
